page.title: 04Compton Village Stores p. 2
page.content: Mr.Mason cannot say exactly how many newspapers etc.he sells,but estimates that the amount of money spent on newspapers and magszines in his shop is Â£260 per week.The Beano is the most popular comic, the most popular women's magazine is womens own. the men's most popular magazine is the golf magazine. Mr.Mason buys 80% of all his other supplies such as groceries, wines and spirits himself. 20% of his supplies come from wholesalers. The vegetable wholesaler dlivers daily; the pie man dlivers twice a week. The ice cream man dlivers once a fornight, so Corona soft drink sopplier. Mr. does not sell milk because milk does not keep fresh. Two milk firims, Unigate and the Co-op deliver to the village .
